title: Grid Visualization
document:
Sheet: Requirements
Requirement: Grid Visualization
Description: Module that allows you to view an orthogonal representation of the network and graphically identify elements that meet a series of conditions (DER, Critical Issues, etc.). Usability, tool awareness
Value/Goal: Usability, tool awareness

title: Audit Module
document:
Sheet: Requirements
Requirement: Audit Module
Description: Module that allows you to log all actions performed by users and services of the DERMS application. Process monitoring and tracking of any conflicts of interest (legal).
Value/Goal: Process monitoring and tracking of potential conflicts of interest (legal)
metadata_json: {"source_file": "Audit_Alarms_KnowledgeBase_merged.csv", "sheet": "Requirements", "requirements": "Modulo di audit", "value": "Process monitoring and tracking of potential conflicts of interest (legal)", "team": "none", "macro_activity": "none", "activity": "none", "profile": "none", "rate_per_day": "none", "estimation_days": NaN}

title: Alarms Module
document:
Sheet: Requirements
Requirement: Alarms Module
Description: Module for designing and managing alarms and notifications in DERMS (critical issues, new contracts, network load, etc.). Operator-configurable alerts, usability.
Value/Goal: Operator-configurable alerts, usability
